value_stack::push_string

Place a string value onto the stack.

Synopsis 
void
push_string(
    string_view s);
Description

This function notionally removes all the characters currently on the stack, then pushes a value containing a string onto the stack formed by appending s to the removed characters.

Exception Safety

Basic guarantee. Calls to memory_resource::allocate may throw.

Parameters

Name

Description

s

The characters to append. This may be empty.
